name: flexy-sandbox-cli
description: Interactive CLI tool for managing Flexy Sandbox containers with full lifecycle management

scripts.prepublishOnly: ./test-local.sh && node --check bin/flexy-sandbox.js && node --check src/commands/config.js && node --check src/commands/lifecycle.js && node --check src/commands/query.js && node --check src/lib/configManager.js && node --check src/lib/dockerManager.js && node --check src/lib/templates.js && node --check src/lib/validator.js && node --check src/utils/constants.js && node --check src/utils/logger.js

author: Flexy Team
